name: Sim Racing Dash for Forza H4
name_original: Sim Racing Dash for Forza H4
description:
Sim Racing Dash for Forza H4 is a telemetry app for Forza Horizon 4 (Xbox One, PC) from Microsoft.

 This app allows to display vehicle information of Forza Horizon 4 by UDP communication with Xbox One / PC.

 When this app detects Forza Horizon 4 (Xbox One / PC) on the same wireless LAN, it starts UDP communication and receives telemetry data from Forza Horizon 4.

 You can receive the following vehicle information 
・Engine RPM 
・Throttle 
・Brake 
・Gear Position
 ・Speed
・Lap Num
・Car Position
・Fuel 
・Current Lap Time
・Last Lap Time
・Best Lap Time
・Tire Temp 
・Current Engine Power 
・Current Engine Torque
・Current Engine Boost
・Car Class
・Current Performance Index 
・Drive Train Type
・Cylinders Num

Please enable UDP telemetry in Game Settings.

Here is the demo video of this application.
https://youtu.be/e7mVogabvK8

Please enjoy this application!
